dcterms:description: A benchmark for the evaluation of RGB-D SLAM systems, used to demonstrate the capabilities of the proposed approach in performing accurate surface reconstructions.
dcterms:title: TUM RGB-D dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Handa
T. Whelan
J.B. McDonald

dcterms:description: A benchmark for RGB-D visual odometry, 3D reconstruction, and SLAM, utilized to measure the impact of varying the NID threshold and the relative weighting factor.
dcterms:title: ICL-NUIM

dcterms:creator: T. Whelan

dcterms:description: A sequence captured during a scan of an office environment, used to measure the scalability of the proposed approach.
dcterms:title: Dyson lab sequence
